Miami Heat guard Tyler Herro is having an incredible season. Coming off the bench, hes averaging 21.6 PPG and shooting 45.7% from the floor. Hes taken a massive leap this season.

articles.author: Marc Topkin
articles.title: Rays, Wander Franco close to new long-term $200 million deal - Tampa Bay Times
articles.description: It will be a major accomplishment for the Rays to have their star player under team control for at least the next decade.
articles.content:
ST. PETERSBURG Wander Franco made it to the majors this past season as a 20-year-old and quickly showed the talent to be a star for a long time.
